    • ChessPiece

      public ChessPiece​(char color, char piece, int i, int j, boolean isActive)
      Parameters:
      color - is the color of chesspiece
      piece - is piece
      i - is representing the location of piece in x-axis in chessboard
      j - is representing the location of piece in y-axis in chessboard
      isActive - is use to check if the piece have been removed or not
